LanguageData.ARA_DropPod.label: Arachnae Air-Sac Pod
LanguageData.ARA_DropPod.description: A gigantic Arachnae drone whose internal cavity can hold large amounts of supplies and insectoids. It uses its body's air sacs to lift off and fly to a destination on the world map, but it self-destructs upon landing. Unlike human drop pods, the air-sac pod does not require fuel and is cheaper to construct.
LanguageData.ARA_ActiveDropPod.label: Arachnae Air-Sac Pod
LanguageData.ARA_DropPodLeaving.label: Arachnae Air-Sac Pod (Leaving)
